title: Best of The Herd for Mar 11, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 11, 2020
description:
Tom Brady's free agency decision will tell us what he values

Anthony Davis might be a problem for the Lakers in the playoffs

Colin tells the story of his face plant that had him out of work for two days

The Cowboys are worried that Dak isn't the guy

Colin plays the 3 Word Game to describe all of the available NFL QBs

Guests: Rob Ryan, 20 year NFL Defensive Coach

Sarah Kustok, Fox Sports NBA Analyst & Brooklyn Nets Analyst 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
